name: job
text: How hast thou helped him that is without power? how savest thou the arm that hath no strength?

name: job
text: How hast thou counselled him that hath no wisdom? and how hast thou plentifully declared the thing as it is?

name: job
text: To whom hast thou uttered words? and whose spirit came from thee?

name: job
text: Dead things are formed from under the waters, and the inhabitants thereof.

name: job
text: Hell is naked before him, and destruction hath no covering.

name: job
text: He stretcheth out the north over the empty place, and hangeth the earth upon nothing.

name: job
text: He bindeth up the waters in his thick clouds; and the cloud is not rent under them.

name: job
text: He holdeth back the face of his throne, and spreadeth his cloud upon it.

name: job
text: He hath compassed the waters with bounds, until the day and night come to an end.

name: job
text: The pillars of heaven tremble and are astonished at his reproof.

name: job
text: He divideth the sea with his power, and by his understanding he smiteth through the proud.

name: job
text: By his spirit he hath garnished the heavens; his hand hath formed the crooked serpent.

name: job
text: Lo, these are parts of his ways: but how little a portion is heard of him? but the thunder of his power who can understand?
